languages.text: "Мастер Херимон — опытный телепат, но его повелитель не расстанется со столь бесценным специалистом. Понадобится внушительная сумма на осуществление... побега мастера Херимона".

"Master Herimon is a seasoned telepath, but his lord would never part with such an incredibly valuable specialist. A sizeable amount of money will be necessary to organise Master Herimon's... escape."
languages.original_text: "Мастер Херимон — опытный телепат, но его повелитель не расстанется со столь бесценным специалистом. Понадобится внушительная сумма на осуществление... побега мастера Херимона".

traits.locale_text: "Master Herimon is a seasoned telepath, but his lord would never part with such an incredibly valuable specialist. A sizeable amount of money will be necessary to organise... Master Herimon's escape."

languages.text: «El maestro Herimon es un telépata consumado, pero su señor nunca permitirá la marcha de un especialista tan increíblemente valioso. Se necesitará una cantidad nada desdeñable de dinero para orquestar la... fuga del maestro Herimon».
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon is a seasoned telepath, but his lord would never part with such an incredibly valuable specialist. A sizeable amount of money will be necessary to organise Master Herimon's... escape."

traits.locale_text: «El maestro Herimon es un telépata consumado, pero su señor nunca permitirá la marcha de un especialista tan increíblemente valioso. Se necesitará una cantidad nada desdeñable de dinero para orquestar la... fuga del maestro Herimon».

languages.text: 「マスター・ヘリモンはベタランのテレパスだが、彼の主があれほどの逸材を手放すことはないだろう。かなりの資金を投入しないと…マスター・ヘリモンを連れ出すことは難しい」
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon is a seasoned telepath, but his lord would never part with such an incredibly valuable specialist. A sizeable amount of money will be necessary to organise Master Herimon's... escape."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ヘリモンはベタランのテレパスだが、彼の主があれほどの逸材を手放すことはないだろう。かなりの資金を投入しないと…マスター・ヘリモンを連れ出すことは難しい」

languages.text: “赫瑞蒙大师是位经验丰富的心灵系灵能者，但他的主人绝对不会放走这样一位极其宝贵的专家。若要协助赫瑞蒙大师……逃亡，需要花费一笔相当可观的费用。”
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon is a seasoned telepath, but his lord would never part with such an incredibly valuable specialist. A sizeable amount of money will be necessary to organise Master Herimon's... escape."

traits.locale_text: “赫瑞蒙大师是位经验丰富的心灵系灵能者，但他的主人绝对不会放走这样一位极其宝贵的专家。若要协助赫瑞蒙大师……逃亡，需要花费一笔相当可观的费用。”

languages.text: "Meister Herimon ist ein erfahrener Telepath, doch sein Lord würde einen solch unglaublich wertvollen Spezialisten niemals ziehen lassen. Es wäre eine beträchtliche Summe nötig, um Meister Herimons ... Flucht zu organisieren."
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon is a seasoned telepath, but his lord would never part with such an incredibly valuable specialist. A sizeable amount of money will be necessary to organise Master Herimon's... escape."

traits.locale_text: "Meister Herimon ist ein erfahrener Telepath, doch sein Lord würde einen solch unglaublich wertvollen Spezialisten niemals ziehen lassen. Es wäre eine beträchtliche Summe nötig, um Meister Herimons ... Flucht zu organisieren."

languages.text: « Maître Hérimon est un télépathe aguerri, mais son seigneur n'acceptera jamais de se séparer d'un auxiliaire aussi précieux. Il faudra rassembler une somme exorbitante pour financer son... évasion. »
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon is a seasoned telepath, but his lord would never part with such an incredibly valuable specialist. A sizeable amount of money will be necessary to organise Master Herimon's... escape."

traits.locale_text: « Maître Hérimon est un télépathe aguerri, mais son seigneur n'acceptera jamais de se séparer d'un auxiliaire aussi précieux. Il faudra rassembler une somme exorbitante pour financer son... évasion. »

languages.text: "Üstat Herimon, deneyimli bir telepattır. Fakat lordu, böylesine muazzam kıymette bir uzmandan asla vazgeçmez. Üstat Herimon'un... Kaçışı için kayda değer miktarda para gerekecektir."
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon is a seasoned telepath, but his lord would never part with such an incredibly valuable specialist. A sizeable amount of money will be necessary to organise Master Herimon's... escape."
